Title: XII.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Jonathan E. Steinberg (teleplay by), Dan Shotz (teleplay by), Julie Siege (story by), Heather Bellson (story editor)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Seeing Flint's steady rise up the ranks leaves Vane feeling like he may be a real threat to his position, and while Eleanor determines which side to choose, elsewhere, Silver and a friend from the past are finally reunited.
